landing.greetingMsg: Welcome to Catena-X - The Automotive Network
landing.heading1: Please finish the following application form to complete the registration of your company for Catena-X
landing.point1: The registration form consists of 5 steps and will take approximately 5-10 minutes of your time
landing.point2: To finish the registration in one run, we propose to ensure that you have the commercial register form of your company handy. If you dont have the form, you can invite the right person in your company to support the registration and upload the form.
landing.point3: You can pause the registration at any time. Re-connect to your registration status by using the login data which you received via e-mail.

registration.subHeading: Please finish the company onboarding by finishing the following tasks to join Catena-X - Automotive Network Portal.
registration.regiStep: Register to Catena-X by entering all information requested in the following 5 Steps
registration.regiSubHeading: Please finish the company onboarding by finishing the following tasks to actively participate and use all functions in the Catena-X Automotive Network Portal.

registrationStepOne.verifyCompayDataSubHeading: Please add below your legal entity company data. For a quick and easy data entering, use your company BPN Number to automatically retrieve all necessary information. If you dont have the BPN, you can use the legal entity nam as well or your enter the company data manually.
registrationStepOne.seachDatabase: Search for your company data by BPN or Company Name to autofill the relevant data fields

finish.greetingMsg: Congratulations! Your registration has been successfully submitted!
finish.point1: You, as well as added Legal Managers, will receive a e-mail with all the details of your registration form
finish.point2: We will validate your registration request. As soon as your registration is approved (usually within 2 working days), you will receive a e-mail confirmation
finish.point3: As soon as you received the confirmation e-mail, you will be able to connect to the portal and procceed with the technical onboarding
